vulnerabilities.title: Improper Input Validation in SocksJS-Node
vulnerabilities.description: Incorrect handling of Upgrade header with the value websocket leads in crashing of containers hosting sockjs apps. This affects the package sockjs before 0.3.20.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-site scripting in SocksJS-node
vulnerabilities.description: htmlfile in lib/transport/htmlfile.js in SockJS before 0.3.0 is vulnerable to Reflected XSS via the /htmlfile c (aka callback) parameter.
